Method Detail

clear

void clear()
           throws java.sql.SQLException
Reset Information Model. Clear all data except configuration.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

addDocument

int addDocument(java.lang.String uri,
                java.lang.String doc,
                boolean isQuery)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
Crawl document into Information Retrieval model. Existing document with provided URI gets re-crawled.

Parameters:
uri - Document Uniform Resource Identifier
doc - Document in plain text
isQuery - Query document flag
Returns:
Document unique ID
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

addQuery

int addQuery(java.lang.String doc)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
Crawl query into Information Retrieval model. Existing query does not get re-crawled.

Parameters:
doc - Query in plain text
Returns:
Query unique ID
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

                  int doc2ID)

search

java.util.List<Document> search(java.lang.String query,
                                int start,
                                int n)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
Search for similar documents.

Parameters:
query - Query in plain text
start - Relative start position in an ordered (by similarity) list of documents
n - Number of documents to return
Returns:
Search results (DocID, URI, similarity)
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

searchIntro

java.util.List<Document> searchIntro(java.lang.String query,
                                     int start,
                                     int n)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Search for similar documents. Return documents intros.

Parameters:
query - Query in plain text
start - Relative start position in an ordered (by similarity) list of documents
n - Number of documents to return
Returns:
Search results (DocID, URI, similarity, First 256 characters of document text)
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

searchFull

java.util.List<Document> searchFull(java.lang.String query,
                                    int start,
                                    int n)
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
Search for similar documents. Return complete documents.

Parameters:
query - Query in plain text
start - Relative start position in an ordered (by similarity) list of documents
n - Number of documents to return
Returns:
Search results (DocID, URI, similarity, Full document text)

java.sql.SQLException
